title: Coldstone - Starting Over 2013
description:
Hi everybody,

If you are looking for striking riffs, peachy Heavy or old school rock supercharged with chorus that hits, then you need COLDSTONE in your Rock'OthÃƒÂ¨que.Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

The COLDSTONE recipe is simple but efficient, a smart dosage of rage and softness very Hetfieldesque, with a tip of madness almost Nirvanaesque, sequence of subtlety and opportunity, mid tempo compositions, melancholics complaints ans speed tracks totally "hit on".Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
Ã¢â‚¬â€¹On stage, The Power-Trio unleashes the hells of Rock, it's the gun on the head, the noise of the slide and the burning squirting which would pull us out from the deepest coma.Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
2012, COLDSTONE, strong of an elaborated technical mastery, had to legitimately cross the step of their obvious musical maturity through the production of their first album "starting over...", strong and convincing".

Enjoy! ;)
